results.title: Introducing Smart Stats, where context trumps raw numbers

results.title: Why Pat Cummins, and not Shubman Gill, is the Smart Stats player of the match
results.seoTitle: KKR v SRH, IPL 2020 - Why Pat Cummins, and not Shubman Gill, is the Smart Stats player of the match
results.summary: Cummins' spell fetched him 75 impact points, 10 more than what Gill got for his 62-ball 70
